analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Parittārammaṇaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naparittārammaṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: paritta ārammaṇam hetum dhammam paṭicca na paritta ārammaṇaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe terasa …pe… vipāke sattarasa
analyzed: saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa ārammaṇe nava pe aññamaññe terasa pe vipāke sattarasa

original: Parittārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggatārammaṇo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: paritta ārammaṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na mahaggata ārammaṇaḥ na na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe avigate nava
